men.\""},{"lineNumber":123020,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前、いい加減にせんと、本当にたたっ斬るぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You better stop it or I'll really chop you monk, the Red Reaper, and the War God..."},{"lineNumber":123023,"originalJapaneseLine":"　強い奴ってのは変人ばかりか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"All the strong ones are just weirdos, huh...\""},{"lineNumber":123024,"originalJapaneseLine":"「各国から剣士を立てたら、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"When fighters were gathered from each country,"},{"lineNumber":123025,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まともなのは俺だけだな、こりゃ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm the only normal one, huh.\""},{"lineNumber":123026,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前のどこがまともだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What part of you is normal?\""},{"lineNumber":123027,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……俺の女」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...My woman.\""},{"lineNumber":123028,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぽっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"*blush*..."},{"lineNumber":123029,"originalJapaneseLine":"ロレックス達の話をよそに、","translatedEnglishLine":"Ignoring the conversation of Rolex and the others,"},{"lineNumber":123030,"originalJapaneseLine":"謙信はランスの言葉をリフレインしていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kenshin was repeating Rance’s words in her mind."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ハハッ、頭から一刀両断されても知らねぇぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Haha, I won't be responsible if your head is sliced in two."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが謙信の細い肩を抱いて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance put his arm around Kenshin's slender shoulder,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分の方に引き寄せた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and pulled her closer to himself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「見ての通り、謙信は俺の女だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As you can see, Kenshin is my woman."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おいおい、そりゃ月とスッポン、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey now, that’s like the moon and a soft-shelled turtle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 太陽とオクトパスってもんだぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the sun and an octopus, that kind of difference."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「タコとイカなら釣り合いもするだろうがよぉ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If it were an octopus and a squid, that would be more balanced though..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私がすっぽんだろうか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Am I the soft-shelled turtle... I wonder."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうだな、自由な月はランス殿に似合う」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's right. A free moon suits Lord Rance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それにスッポンはとても美味……」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she's serious about what she's saying."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんか、すごーーーく失礼なこと言っとらんか？」
軍師の嬢ちゃんはあんたの意を汲んで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A strategist like you surely understands my point,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんなこたぁ言わねぇだろうから俺が言う」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and wouldn't say something like this, so I'll say it instead."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「坊主は確かにただもんじゃねえ。
強いし、行動力も、天運もある」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's strong, has initiative, and even luck on his side."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こいつに惚れた女は不幸になる！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Any woman who falls for this guy will be unhappy!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぜーーーったいに、やめた方がいい！」
「貴方が私の為を思って言ってくれていること。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I understand that you say these things thinking about my well-being.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、よく言ったぞ謙信！」
「確かに私はやめるようには
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Indeed, I never told you to stop,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「言っても止まらないからですよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's because telling you to stop wouldn't work anyway."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 代償に最悪の男の趣味をお与えになった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: as a price, gave him the worst taste in men."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前、いい加減にせんと、本当にたたっ斬るぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You better stop it or I'll really chop you down."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この坊主といい、赤い死神といい、軍神といい……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This monk, the Red Reaper, and the War God...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 強い奴ってのは変人ばかりか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: All the strong ones are just weirdos, huh..."
"When fighters were gathered from each country,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まともなのは俺だけだな、こりゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm the only normal one, huh."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロレックス達の話をよそに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ignoring the conversation of Rolex and the others,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 謙信はランスの言葉をリフレインしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kenshin was repeating Rance’s words in her mind.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
